entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
WINDY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
